divs: sighting detailsi was cooking rice for sushi. i suddenly, as i leaned forward, felt a sharp pain in my stomach. i thought i must have burnt myself but the top wasn't on fire or damaged, just my stomach, so i decided to finish the rice. it was strange though that it was already finished (it takes about an hour for me to cook because i'm fussy) and starchy water had spilt out onto the stovetop. later when i looked carefully, worried i'd damaged my top, i found that there was a scar in the dead centre of my stomach. not an open cut, not a burn, but a scar. about three centremetres from my navel. -half an inch long. -5 millimetres wide. -irratated skin around edges -tender. it was strange but i didn't really know what to do about it or what it'd be. my work clothes hadn't been burnt and as strange as it seems, that was what bothered me more at the time. but there was no blood, nothing sharp around the stove. i continued to cook with the rice and didn't think on it further, it was dark and i didn't want to think about anything scaryish. it's been almost a week later and it hasn't changed. it hasn't healed, or got worse, and i realized that there was something odd about it. it resembled my surgical scars from old keyhole surgery, after the surgery, and the stomach above the cut was really itchy, like that 'healing itch' itchy that wounds get. it is still like that. wound is still pink around edges, whiteish in centre, shrunk a bit but still exactly the same as before. i have a lapband around my uppar stomach. (hense the keyhole surgery scars.) a few days ago the stomach swelled very badly, very very badly, and there was an area to the left of the stomach that really badly hurt to the point of being unable to sleep. i was tempted to wake my room mate to take me to the hospital, i was pacing up and down outside her room concidering it at 2am, but for some reason i changed my mind and went to bed. i'm sorry, i can't get good photos. but it's the second weird scar i've gotten. the other weird wound was about an inch and a half below the bellybutton, to the right. it was a perfect circle, raised up (like a donut) on the edges and a perfect dent\circle wound in the middle. i seriously mean a perfect circle, i checked it. still trying to heal. it happened about two weeks ago. i noticed it during the day. i have photos of both but i need to get them off my phone. not first weird events. i had a possible abduction when i was four, other possible abductions between 5 and 10, one during a school camp when i was 13.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Brisbane
There were no other sightings in Brisbane on or around August 18th 2008
Summary: Strange cut on stomach, another below bellybutton, lost time?
